reviews_data.review_text: Delicious decaf almond milk latte with lavender!
Great place and good service. Seating was tough to find inside but lot of chairs outside.

Cute little coffee place, pretty small space but some seating available. On the pricier side for drinks, and the syrup/brew in my pumpkin pie had an odd grainy texture towards the end that I didn't enjoy.
Wonderful coffee and beautiful atmosphere. The location is next to the light rail, making it convenient to get to the numerous venues in the city. Great service and prices!
Nice little coffee shop! We had a matcha and a cappuccino and both were good.
Not a lot of seating if you're looking to work, limited outlets as well. But great coffee and service.
The place is cute and great for working! It's decked out in holiday decor right now which is nice. The baristas are so friendly. There is a parking lot with 2 hour free retail parking.
Always a great experience. Love the atmosphere to hang with friends or get work done on my laptop. Huge fan of their seasonal drinks!

Love this place! I recently had a hot chai latte, but have enjoyed so many different drinks. The team is helpful and I really like how cozy it is. My husband and I have off on  Wednesdays and love to start here with coffee and a muffin : )

Beautiful place with high quality coffee and syrups with real spices and authentic flavors. I love that they support local artists and crafts-people with the products they display on the shelves. I've bought a local candle and later a pair of handmade earrings there too, plus their store merchandise is always cute!
This coffee shop is hands down the best in Charlotte. The staff, ever changing art work, and just overall feel of the place makes my heart happy! Grab a coffee, tea, or even wine and sit and relax!

I was excited to try Summit since I've heard great things, but was super disappointed in the quality of the latte. The staff was really friendly, but the latte was just straight up bad. I'm not sure what happened or if this is just how it always tastes, but I got a hot PSL and it was insanely watered down. I ordered it with whole milk, and it tastes like it was made with a mix of skim and water. Plus there didn't seem to be much espresso in there. It tasted like half a shot for the 12oz of “milk”? This was the worst latte I've ever had in my life. I wasted $6 on this and it was still worth it to toss it out. When I was pouring it down the sink too it even looked super watery. Not sure what the hype is about, but save yourself $7 and try another coffee shop or make it at home. I can seriously make a better tasting latte at home with my Nespresso.
Friendly staff, neat atmosphere. Coffee was fresh and fantastic. Also got a pastry that was delicious. Will be back.
Cozy atmosphere and the maple coffee hit the spot.

We were in town for a conference and tried this lovely coffee shop on the way to the airport. They have some seriously delicious coffee and baked goods. I tried oat milk latte, and my friends got regular latte and decaf cappuccino. I really loved that they give you glasses to fill up your water, not cheap plastic cups. Inside is nicely decorated and you feel like you are entering into an oasis. They also have some outdoor seating which we enjoyed. I will go back next time I am in town.
Nice

Maple Sea Salt Latte. 10/10  I loved that there was outdoor seating and I even found a table near an outlet I could plug my laptop into. It was a small/intimate space and was just what I needed for today's mentorship meeting. Will definitely keep this spot in mind for future meeting/consultation/admin time.
I love Summit Noda. They do not charge for non-dairy milk. Yay! Love their vegan pumpkin choc chip muffin & the app is super convenient.
Insanely overpriced

Got a tangerine ginger iced tea and loved it! A very friendly and cozy environment to hang out. Fun rainbow flags and NoDa merch. They have some flyers on the wall of lgbt socials and groups that I found really helpful too!
Cute store, friendly staff, and great coffee. Couldn't ask for more!
Best coffee in NODA! The atmosphere, coffee, and employees are all wonderful!

Let me give you my edited version that isn't as harsh but honest - worth posting on Google! :  "My second visit in. The workers were kind which is why I even gave 2 stars. The atmosphere is strange here. They have dark occult art on the wall, which doesn't complement the aesthetic unless they are communicating their love for the occult (I did not appreciate the workers' conversations making fun of their moms' love for Jesus).  One piece of "art" that was particularly uncomfortable to look at was the one on the center of the wall. It had the word MISANTHROPE, which means to hate mankind, and also the words 'city of fools.'  The chai tea I ordered was not flavorful but watery; it tasted like warm cinnamon water. Also tried a lemonade matcha, but that tasted like a lemon Le Croix.  I cannot recommend this place at all.
Best coffee in Charlotte
Beautiful space, love the location. Had some really fun specials. Delish desserts! Cortado was o.k. iced latte was a bit sweet for me, but overall good. :) Great experience!
Best coffee and service in charlotte
Best coffee!!!
Got a croissant and the barista recommended the Shake it Off. It's a lavender latte with oat milk. So good! Nice staff, good music, and relaxing atmosphere 👍🏼

Absolutely love Summit Coffee! The people here are so nice. I tried their lavender oat milk latte for anyone wondering and it was perfect! Their other options are amazing too. Walking distance from the lightrail too!!! Pics to come!
Great latte and friendly staff. It was nice going to a smaller chain rather than the typical Starbucks or Dunkin for a change.
My favorite coffee spot!! The staff is so friendly and the atmosphere is welcoming. Best coffee in town!!!

It's the best coffee I've had in Charlotte. The service here is the type that makes you say "wow, they were so nice" right after they take your order. And the ambience is nice and cozy. It's a smaller place with a little bit of outdoor seating so I wouldn't plan to get a seat on the weekend, but to just take it to-go! Lastly... if you see an apple turnover in the case.. you should buy it.

Wow what a lovely place! I loved the atmosphere and the vibe of this place. I ordered the vanilla oat milk latte, and Parker did beautiful latte art. The staff was all very kind and welcoming. I work at a coffee shop out of town and chatted with them for a bit, and they even gave me pointers for getting the hang of latte art. Will 100% be coming back next time I'm in the CLT area!

Very good espresso.  Staff was stand-offish. Did not feel comfortable there. Glad they had outside seating. Not likely to come back as there are plenty of option that are more welcoming.  Too bad. I like independent shops and seek them out. Specifically for good products and friendly service.

The people were very friendly and welcoming, however the products were a disappointment. I had a dirty chai, which tasted like it was about 90% water and had very little flavor and also a blueberry muffin, which had blueberries in it but was closer to a bran muffin in texture and flavor. My friend had an Americano, which she indicated tasted burned and weak, and also an apple butter galette, which was good. Presentation was beautiful, I just wish the experience was as good. I doubt I will go back since it was a bit of a drive for me anyway. I wanted to like it!
The best damn coffee, baristas, and vibe in town!

The best drip coffee you'll find in the Charlotte metro, hands down. I also highly recommend buying their beans if you're a third wave coffee fan, I brew Summit beans with a Chemex and find it rivals every high end bean I've bought. Lattes etc are good too.

Went for a t-shirt my son asked me to pick up for him. Decided to try their fall latte. It was delicious! Just the right amount of fall spice paired with a hint of orange. Definitely going back before it's gone!
Great spot to wake up!

This is one of my favorite places to get coffee.  The staff is always very friendly with great service.  Coffee and ambiance are great for studying or reading a book.  I usually order on the app and get my food to go, another convenient option.  Glad they're in the neighborhood :)
Great Coffee taste, Pricy, needs more options, great decor.

This place is so great. They have fantastic coffee, frozen drinks and they also have beer. They are open till 7 on Sundays (much later than Smelly Cat down the street). Also they have a wonderful staff who are knowledgeable, kind and eager to help! I'd give this place 6/5 stars if I could!!!!!!!!!!!!!
This place is adorable! The baristas were friendly and I was happy they could make my favorite drink (matcha+lavender). Seems like a nice place to journal or hang out with a friend 😊
Love this location and the barista's are amazing !!!

Great locally roasted coffee! I've bought a fair amount of espresso drinks and drip coffee here, and I got their house roast beans which were fresh and not too dark! Thd cold brew was prepackaged apparently from one of their main locations and seemed a bit overpriced but was fine.
Staff was extremely nice and super delicious coffee
Super nice peeps & the latte is worth the $$$
Great coffee and staff!

Really nice spot with a lot of other great places around. I used to go to the Summit in Davidson a lot when I was in school up there, so it's nice to have one so close to home so I can continue to support them.
Best on the planet!
Stopped by after dinner and the baristas here are so lovely and friendly.  The coffee is really flavorful and delicious!

Talk about which essential morning cup of coffee! We had a great experience here thanks to Madison! Fantastic coffee, delicious scones, of which the lemon and lavender one was a delightful surprise! Utter perfection. The beautiful decor for me to feel as soon as you walk in. Definitely go support as possible business, esp if you're getting some Jeni's next door!

Very lovely coffee shop. Great,  great coffee,  atmosphere,  and service.  I love the matching color scheme,  the open space,  and outside area. Definitely a cute spot for good coffee,  pastries,  and even a reading spot.  So glad we stopped by!
Yummy iced latte - smooth espresso and nice winter spice flavor 😋 served with quick, friendly service!
Great neighborhood coffee shop! Wish there was an option to write in your tip amount on the app.
Very nice staff and great atmosphere
